//: This is extending the vanilla snippets belonging to mostly work of random people: chat logs, SMSes, popular photos and videos that people share, or something they can film by themselves.

text.name: voices on the radio:deftones
text.text: A voice cuts in across the static, 'And for the next hour we'll be playing the last Deftones album Through the Green Door.  I wonder if we collectively went through a green door before the world went crazy.'  The radio blasts Deftones music until you lose the station a few songs in.

text.name: voices on the radio:darkest of the hillside thickets
text.text: You find a faint signal: 'This is [unintelligible] bringing you Darkest of the Hillside Thickets' new single Don't Talk with the Voice in the Storm!  I'm not really sure how new this single is as I never heard it before the Cataclysm and it showed up in an envelope stapled to the station door one morning after a reality storm.  I suppose there are creepier ways to bring me new music but I don't know what they are, and I'm begging you not to enact them.
